subject: Football
Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Nick Saban’s two seasons as the Dolphins’ coach have remained fresh in the minds of former players, who have called him everything from a “control freak” to “one of the smartest minds.”
snippet: Nick Saban’s two seasons as the Dolphins’ coach have remained fresh in the minds of former players, who have called him everything from a “control freak” to “one of the smartest minds.”
